data.title: Radice.
data.description: A culinary dialogue between the soil and the chef. Hyper-seasonal, zero-waste, and unapologetically authentic.

data.label: Our Ethos
data.title: Cooking is an act of submission.
data.quote: We do not choose the ingredients. The soil dictates, we merely obey.
data.description: Chef Marco Ferretti built Radice on a radical premise: silence the ego and listen to the land. Every morning, the menu is rewritten based on the harvest, the weather, and the raw truth of the season.

data.caption: 06:00 AM. The morning harvest at our private estate.

cards.title: Hyper-Local
cards.description: We know the hands that harvest. Every ingredient is sourced within a 30km radius, supporting the micro-economy of our valley.

cards.title: Radical Seasonality
cards.description: If it's not growing outside right now, it's not on your plate. We don't force nature; we follow its rhythm.

cards.title: Circular Kitchen
cards.description: Root to stem. Nose to tail. Fermentation, composting, and creative reuse ensure nothing is ever lost.

cards.title: Heirloom Guardians
cards.description: We cultivate forgotten varieties in our private garden, protecting the biodiversity and flavors that time forgot.

data.title: The Root Path
data.subtitle: Seven acts of nature. A sensory journey through the textures of our terroir.
